        <description/>
        <name>AisCreateRuleDocActions</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AisCreateRuleDocActions = Class.create();
AisCreateRuleDocActions.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    search: function() {
        var profile = this.getParameter("sysparm_search_profile");
        var query = this.getParameter("sysparm_user_query");
        var offset = this.getParameter("sysparm_query_offset");
        var locale = this.getParameter("sysparm_query_locale");

        var client = new sn_ais.SearchAdminQuery();
        client.setProfile(profile);
        client.setOffset(offset);
        client.setQuery(query);
        client.setQueryLocale(locale);
        client.search();

        var resp = {};
        resp.totalHits = client.getTotalHits();
        resp.documents = client.getDocuments();
        resp.nextPageOffset = client.getNextPageOffset();
        return JSON.stringify(resp);
    },

    createActions: function() {
        var ids = JSON.parse(this.getParameter("sysparm_ids"));
        var action_type = this.getParameter("sysparm_action_type");
		var start_order = this.getParameter("sysparm_start_order");
        var rule = this.getParameter("sysparm_rule");

        var docField = "block_doc";
        if (action_type == "PROMOTE")
            docField = "promote_doc";
		
		var i = start_order/100;
		if (start_order%100 == 0)
			i += 1;
		else
			i = Math.ceil(i);

		for (var id in ids) {
			var title = ids[id];
			var action = new GlideRecord('ais_rule_action');
            action.setValue("label", title.replace(/(<([^>]+)>)/g, ""));
            action.setValue("type", action_type);
            action.setValue("rule", rule);
            action.setValue("order", ((i) * 100).toFixed(0));
            action.setValue(docField, id);
            action.update();
			i += 1;
		}
    }

});]]></script>
